scripts.build: cross-env ELEVENTY_ENV=production SITE_URL=https://tooleble.com npx tailwindcss -i ./styles/input.css -o ./_site/styles/output.css --minify && npx @11ty/eleventy --input=src --output=./_site
scripts.deploy: cross-env ELEVENTY_ENV=production SITE_URL=https://hasnainzia20.github.io/demo-eleventy-site npx tailwindcss -i ./styles/input.css -o ./_site/styles/output.css --minify && npx @11ty/eleventy && gh-pages -d _site
